title: Lexiphor — PyQt5 Code Indenter & Formatter
blurb: One GUI to unify indentation, whitespace policy, and readability across mixed-language repos.
description: Lexiphor is a PyQt5 desktop formatter for C, C++, Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, HTML, CSS, JSON, Go, Perl, Lua, R, Ruby, Rust, and more. It standardizes indentation (tabs↔spaces, width), trims noise (trailing whitespace, duplicate blank lines), enforces final newline, and applies language-aware rules. Project presets keep large repos consistent. Batch mode formats entire trees safely with dry-run, diffs, and backups.
